nodes.text: The Sanyassans, a reptilian species from Sanyassa IV, used hieroglyphs to write their own language. In a scouting report to Emperor Palpatine, the Imperial Sergeant Pfilbee Jhorn mentions the Sanyassan hieroglyphs he saw on Endor. According to the sergeant, such characters were crudely carved in stones around the entranceway of King Terak's castle, but he could not interpret them.
